lead_paragraph: The IOC will advise all national Olympic bodies on how to deal with the Zika virus ahead of the games in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: IOC to Advise National Olympic Bodies on Zika Virus
headline.main: IOC to Advise National Olympic Bodies on Zika Virus
